=Advanced !ModelAdmin Configuration=

Basic model administration configuration was covered previously in
[PHPAppModelAdmin Configuring ModelAdmin Definitions], but !ModelAdmin
has many more options available.

==Configuration Directives==

|| Method/Property || Description ||
|| *setFieldOption*(_$field_, _$option_, _$value_) || Set a field specific option.  For a list of common options, see [PHPAppFieldOptions Field-Specific Options] ||
